modName: Tobi Uchiha sound for Player Voicesets - DELETED
summary: Makes your Dovahkiin sound like Obito from Naruto Shippuden series.
descriptionHtml:
The title says it all. You now have a voice of Obito Uchiha, which is triggered at certain situations like:

- Entering Dungeon (Discovering new area)
- Fighting (Entering combat)
- Receiving high amounts of damage
- Killing an enemy
- Dying
- Taunting enemies (button for this can be assigned from MCM menu)
- Leveling up
- Finding rare loot

[center][u]REQUIREMENTS:[/u][/center]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51387/?]Player Voicesets by ChizFoShiz[/url], and all the requirements for that mod
*NOTE: You have to install "[b]Last Version with Custom Voice" ![/b]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51136/?]
[/url][center][u]HIGHLY RECOMMENDED MODS:[/u]
(This one is almost essential, it is made for it...)[/center][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51136/?]The Uchiha Clan by esuriddick and Omega1084[/url], with all the requirements of its own.
(You'll find many things from anime put together in this one, including clothing, weapons, powers and spells, and many more...)

[center][u]INSTALLATION:[/u][/center]
Put the Data folder inside your root Skyrim directory, simple as that. (Player Voicesets must be installed first !)

[u][center]CREDITS:[/center][/u]
ChizFoShiz, for awesome voice work on Skyrim game. Best of luck to him.

Enjoy the mod !
author: aston94srb
